channel.title: A Flavour of German
channel.itunes:summary: If you've been learning German for a while, perhaps it's time to increase your range of vocabulary and start to use the kind of language native German speakers use. The words and phrases taught in "A Flavour of German" will guarantee to impress native speakers and will make you sound all the more German!
channel.itunes:author: Radio Lingua Network
channel.description: If you've been learning German for a while, perhaps it's time to increase your range of vocabulary and start to use the kind of language native German speakers use. The words and phrases taught in "A Flavour of German" will guarantee to impress native speakers and will make you sound all the more German!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Expand your vocabulary and range of expression with teacher Julia as she teaches you real German in regular episodes of

item.title: Happy Holidays (and 20% off) from the Radio Lingua Network
item.description: This holiday season give the gift of language to someone you love and get 20% discount on all our products using the coupon code HOLIDAYS08
item.content:encoded: This holiday season give the gift of language to someone you love and get 20% discount on all our products using the coupon code HOLIDAYS08
item.itunes:subtitle: 20% off all products in our Winter Sale and Happy Holidays from the whole team!

item.title: Radio Lingua Network News: 26 September 2008
item.description: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners! By way of joining in this international celebration of languages and language-learning we're delighted to introduce eight new podcasts today. We're adding Catalan, Danish, French, Japanese, Mandarin and Romanian to our One Minute Languages series; we're introducing our first podcast for English learners - Write Back Soon will help learners master Phrasal Verbs; and we're finally announcing the long-awaited sequel to Coffee Break Spanish: it's Show Time!
item.content:encoded: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners! By way of joining in this international celebration of languages and language-learning we're delighted to introduce eight new podcasts today. We're adding Catalan, Danish, French, Japanese, Mandarin and Romanian to our One Minute Languages series; we're introducing our first podcast for English learners - Write Back Soon will help learners master Phrasal Verbs; and we're finally announcing the long-awaited sequel to Coffee Break Spanish: it's Show Time!
item.itunes:subtitle: Happy European Day of Languages to all our listeners

item.title: A Flavour of German - Lesson 10
item.description: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 10 you will learn to talk about wishing good luck using more interesting German. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
item.content:encoded: Spice up your language with A Flavour of German. Learn to use real German and increase your range of expression. In episode 10 you will learn to talk about wishing good luck using more interesting German. Access our lesson guide and enhanced podcasts from our website on http://www.languageflavours.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Use idiomatic German to talk about wishing good luck.

item.title: Radio Lingua Network News: 5 September 2008
item.description: The latest news from Radio Lingua including details of Coffee Break Spanish arrangements, new podcasts launched this autumn and the Radio Lingua video contest in which you can win an iPod.
item.content:encoded: The latest news from Radio Lingua including details of Coffee Break Spanish arrangements, new podcasts launched this autumn and the Radio Lingua video contest in which you can win an iPod.

item.title: A Flavour of German - Special Announcement
item.description: Announcing the premium version of A Flavour of German. If you can't wait until September for the full course, you can purchase all ten episodes in enhanced audio format, featuring the words and phrases taught in each lesson on your iPod or computer screen as you listen. The Season Pass also includes the full lesson guide in pdf format.
item.content:encoded: Announcing the premium version of A Flavour of German. If you can't wait until September for the full course, you can purchase all ten episodes in enhanced audio format, featuring the words and phrases taught in each lesson on your iPod or computer screen as you listen. The Season Pass also includes the full lesson guide in pdf format.
item.itunes:subtitle: Information about the Season Pass
